title: Painter
summaries: The Painter is an NPC vendor who sells paint and painting tools, as well as paintings and wallpapers. He will spawn once the following conditions are met:

• There is an empty house.
  • 8 / 4 other town NPCs are in the world. Note that while the Old Man, Traveling Merchant, and town pets count towards this total, the Skeleton Merchant does not.

The Painter's shop inventory changes based on external factors. The biome in which he is talked to, the <linked>moon phase</linked>, and <linked>seasonal events</linked> all determine which paintings and wallpapers are available.

On the <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop version</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console version</linked>, and <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile version</linked>, the Painter will attack nearby enemies with his <linked>Paintball Gun</linked> to defend himself, dealing 8 / <linked>12</linked> / <linked>14</linked> damage in <linked>Pre-Hardmode</linked> (increasing to 10 / <linked>15</linked> / <linked>17</linked> damage in <linked>Hardmode</linked>), and (on the <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop version</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console version</linked>, and <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile version</linked>) as players progress he will gain <linked>various stat increases</linked>.
